addFunctionContext

public void addFunctionContext(java.lang.String aName,
                               java.lang.String aNamespace,
                               java.lang.String aClassName)
                        throws AeException
Add the function context to the container.

Parameters:
aName - The user specified name for the grouping
aNamespace - Namespace to match on.
aClassName - IAeExpressionFunctionContext impl class name.
Throws:
AeException - Throw if there is a problem finding/creating the IAeFunctionContext impl.
